Plot: Darren Shan was just an ordinary schoolboy - until his visit to the Cirque Du Freak. Now, as he struggles with his new life as a Vampire's Assistant, he tries desperately to resist the one temptation that sickens him, the one thing that can keep him alive. But destiny is calling... the Wolf Man is waiting.
Characters: Darren Shan, Angela Shan, Dermot Shan, Annie Shan, Hibernius Tall, Wolf-Man, Alexander Ribs, Rhamus Twobellies, Hans Hands, Larten Crepsley, Madam Octa, Gertha Teeth, Sive, Seersa, Evra Von, Truska, Stanley J. Collins, Cormac Limbs, Michael, Danny, Evanna, Paris Skyle, Sam Grest, Mr. Tiny
